Package ooga.model.components.moveconditions

Class MoveOtherPiece

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.components.moveconditions.Condition
ooga.model.components.moveconditions.MoveOtherPiece
public class MoveOtherPiece
extends Condition
Used to move another piece relative to the piece that was passed. Is executed after the piece passed is moved

    • MoveOtherPiece

      public MoveOtherPiece​(FrontEndExternalAPI viewController, GameBoard gameBoard, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters, GamePiece piece, int direction)
      Constructor used to hold things that many piece movement objects may need
      Parameters:
      viewController - The controller used to communicate with the front end
      gameBoard - The board that the pieces are on.
      parameters - Holds the relative starting x and y coordinates and the ending relative x and y coordinates of the piece to move
      piece - The piece that this condition corresponds to

      Moves a piece on the board, relative to our piece
      Specified by:
      executeCondition in class Condition
      Parameters:
      endingCoordinates - The ending coordinates of the piece that a piece is being moved relative to
